mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee ( first_name, last_name, first_name_kana, last_name_kana, birthday, gender, tel, position_id, salary_of_month ) VALUES ( #{entity.firstName}, #{entity.lastName}, #{entity.firstNameKana}, #{entity.lastNameKana}, #{entity.birthday}, #{entity.gender}, #{entity.tel}, #{entity.positionId}, #{entity.salaryOfMonth} )
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET first_name = #{entity.firstName}, last_name = #{entity.lastName}, first_name_kana = #{entity.firstNameKana}, last_name_kana = #{entity.lastNameKana}, tel = #{entity.tel}, position_id = #{entity.positionId}, salary_of_month = #{entity.salaryOfMonth} WHERE employee_id = #{entity.employeeId}
mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.first_name_kana, e.last_name_kana, e.birthday, e.gender, e.tel, e.position_id, es.skill_id, e.salary_of_month FROM employee e LEFT JOIN employee_skill es on e.employee_id = es.employee_id WHERE e.employee_id = #{employeeId}
